verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] canceling the June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , citing the " tremendous anger and open hostility " in a recent statement from North Korea

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: canceling] [ARG1: the June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: citing the " tremendous anger and open hostility " in a recent statement from North Korea]
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is canceling the June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , [V: citing] [ARG1: the " tremendous anger and open hostility " in a recent statement from North Korea]
